metadata.title: CVE-2017-15938 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: dwarf2.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), asdistributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, miscalculates DW_FORM_ref_addr die refsin the case of a relocatable object file, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (find_abstract_instance_name invalid memory read,segmentation fault, and application crash).

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
